trans-unit.source: Represents the method that will handle the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 表示将处理的方法<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=fullName> event is raised by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> class when the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> is drawn and the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property value is `true`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=fullName>事件由引发<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>类时<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>绘制和<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName>属性值是`true`。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.OwnerDraw%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Draw?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs> class contains all the information needed to paint the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>, including the ToolTip text, the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object on which the drawing should be done.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs>类包含绘制所需的所有信息<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>，包括工具提示文本， <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>，和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>对象上完成绘图。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DrawToolTipEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: To customize the look of the ToolTip, use the <xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle> to determine the bounds of the ToolTip, and the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> object to perform your customized drawing.
trans-unit.target: 若要自定义工具提示的外观，使用<xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>来确定的工具提示，边界和<xref:System.Drawing.Graphics>对象来执行自定义的绘图。</xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> </xref:System.Drawing.Rectangle>

trans-unit.source: You can increase the bounds of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip> before it is shown by handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> event.
trans-unit.target: 你可以增加的边界<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>显示通过处理之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip.Popup> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.ToolTip>

trans-unit.source: When you create a DrawToolTipEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 当创建 DrawToolTipEventHandler 委托时，需要标识将处理该事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要将事件与事件处理程序关联，添加到事件的委托的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非移除了该委托，称为每当发生该事件时，事件处理程序。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event handler delegates, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。
